name: A Second Circle Valentine's Day
description:
**If the game appears to have frozen. Click on the game window a few times to unfreeze it**

It's Valentine's Day in the HellTaker household. Enjoy this cute little side story of romance featuring several new sprites and outfits for everyone's favorite demon of love (or lust).  We hope you enjoy this little delve into the daily lives of the demons celebrating one of our mortal holidays and that it can put a smile on your face as you read it.

Check out the main game: "Second Circle": https://helldev103120.itch.io/the-second-circle

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/secondcircle

Join the subreddit:https://www.reddit.com/r/HellTakerSecondCircle/

Follow us on Twitter: @133Team
